MWAHAHAHA!   Finally I can create sadistic puzzles of my own twisted design!

We finally get to find out what happened to Chell after she got knocked out at the end of Protal 1.  Good puzzles, crisp video and the left handed insults from the mainframe are as pithy as ever. 

Valve hasn't let me down yet.

เป็นเกมส์ที่สนุกมากๆซื้อมาคุ้มโหมดเนื้อเรื่องดีส่วนโหมด co-op ก็สนุกไม่แพ้กันแต่ดูเหมือนว่าจะสนุกกว่าด้วยซํ้าเพราะต้องช่วยกันคิดหาทางผ่าน

It goes without saying this is exceptionally one of the greatest first-person shooter games that doesn't require real bullets, competitive teamwork, accurate aiming, targets and most other common mechanics that are found in that specific genre to make such a fantastic and charming game. This title demonstrates what it always had shown in the prequel; perfect gameplay and immersive story-telling. Thus, this sequel opens the gateway to the remarkable Portal series.

Now, imagine all of those unanswered questions and obscure mysteries that linger within the first game, and how this sequel answers nearly all those said questions with the utmost scientific explanations through the lines of entertainment from this one. From what I could honestly tell you, this game took the first games mechanics, and widened the story much more bigger and exceptionally better. Portal 2 is by far, worthy of the 'Game of the Year 2011' awards.

Все мы знаем, что каждое творение от Valve является шедевром и Portal был не исключением. Нынешнее продолжение именуемое как Portal 2 превзошел предшественницу на 500%. Я бы даже сказал, что это идеальная игра во всех смыслах этого слова. Начиная с того, что в ней просто потрясающее чувство юмора и конечно же с одной из лучших персонажей видео игр ГлэДос. Отличные головоломки, сюжет и подача уникального сюжета, это всё делает игру незабываемой. А финал в игре вообще считается одним из лучших моментов за всё время существования игр. А дополняет игру ещё и потрясающий и уникальный кооперативный режим, который дополняет как игровой процесс так и сюжет на столько же времени как и сама игра. В общем.... БРАВО! 10 из 10

[h1]Points positifs[/h1]

+ Campagne trés prenante avec des personnages charismatiques (Wheatley avec son coté bête, GladOS et son envie de tuer)
+ Le mode Co-Op, ou l'on peut y jouer a 2, la campagne est differante évidemment, et elle aussi est super!
+ Le support du Steam Workshop, qui permet de trouver des maps géniales, avec les décors modifiés, les voix modifiés, etc.. Certains mapmakers sont trés bons et permettent d'augmenter la durée de vie au jeu.
+ Possibilité de faire un speedrun du jeu, car le jeu est aussi adapté pour, grâce au mode de jeu Challenge!
+ Gameplay simple, quatres boutons : tirs droit et gauche, s'accroupir et sauter.
+ Concepteur de cartes ajoutée directement au jeu, dur a utiliser mais complet

[h1]Points négatifs[/h1]

- L'histoire autour du jeu n'est pas assez dévelloppé. Je ne vais pas spoil ^^
- La possibilité de jouer a 2 seulement.
- Faible durée de vie malgré le contenu du Workshop
- Chell ne parle pas :(

[b][i]En bref, ce jeu est super mais ne vous attendez pas non plus a y passer 100 heures de jeu comme certains, mais c'est un jeu que je conseille malgré tout, pour sa campagne superbe !

Spottoche[/i][b]
Gra Portal 2 jest epicka i wciągająca. Najbardziej podobało mi się przyszłość, w której się znajdujemy. Przy tej grze jest dużo zabawy, śmiechu i głowkowania
awesome game valve! looking forward to portal 3!

Bir oyundan ne isteriz? Ne bekleriz yeni bir oyun aldığımızda?
Özgün olsun, oynanışı keyifli olsun; keyfini kaçıracak kadar zor, keyifsiz hâle getirecek kadar kolay olmasın, senaryosu doyurucu olsun, grafikler yeterli olsun vesaire vesaire. 
Bakalım Portal 2'ye:
Portal zaten aşırı derecede özgün bir fikir, bunun aksini söyleyemeyiz sanırım. İkinci oyun da bundan yeterince nasibini almış, farklı bir oyun deneyimi sunuyor bize.
Oynanışı keyifli mi? Kesssinlikle! :) Şahsen Fallout gibi, Skyrim gibi RPG'lere düşkün birisi olmama ve hack&slash de sevmeme rağmen portal 2'nin oyun sistemi yaklaşık bir saat oynamamın ardından beni ciddi şekilde etkiledi. O bir saat de sizi portal evrenine alıştırma evresi, portalların ve oyundaki diğer elementlerin kullanışını keşfetme vakti diyelim. Basit meseleleri kavradığınızda, bambaşka bir evrende, farklı bir sistemde olduğunuzu anlayınca oynanışın keyfini farkediyorsunuz zaten. 
Keyif kaçıracak kadar zor olan bölümler var elbette. Neticede bu nereden bakarsanız bakın bir zekâ oyunu olarak görülebilir. Bütün bölümlerde kafayı biraz zorlamak gerekiyor. Bazı bölümlerde ise motoru yakma ihtimaliniz yüksek. Yine de bu -kulağa biraz mazoşistçe gelse de- zekâsını sınamak isteyen, klasik fps'lerden sıkılıp da biraz bulmaca çözmek isteyen herkes için keyifli olacaktır. Tavsiyem, bir bölümde yarım saatten fazla kaldıysanız ''belki'' walktrough videolarına başvurmanız. Her takıldığınızda bakmak oyunun amacına ters düşer zira.
Senaryo ve karakterlerin işlenişi ise bambaşka bir mevzu. Bunun yaşayıp görülmesi gereken bir olay olduğunu düşünüyor ve ayrıntı vermekten kaçınıyorum :)
Grafikler de keza nev-i şahsına münhasır diyebileceğimiz nitelikte. Oyunun ilerleyişine uygun, sade gibi görünen ancak görkemli olan efektlerle ve çevre modellemeleriyle oyun üzerindeki emek rahatlıkla okunuyor. 
Velhasılıkelâm, ben bu oyunu uzun zamandır geri planda tutuyordum ama ne kadar büyük bir hata yaptığımı oynamaya başlayınca anladım. Kesinlikle kaçırılmaması gereken bir deneyim olduğunu düşünüyor ve şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum.

Hmm, lets see, what do I have to say about the best game ever? Well what is there to say? This game is like watching a movie (a good movie), only better, SO much better. I like games that make you think, and if you look up some things about how the making of this game and its prequal went about being accomplished, you'll gain a new appreciation for it. There's even a Developer Commentary in-game for even more information on its making.

You can also make your own maps and play ones that others have created. Granted about 1% of the maps are actually good, but there's over 400,000 maps available, so that's about 4,000 good maps; that's not too bad really. There's even a community made set of race maps called "Gelocity" (and a few others) that never get old, they let you race in a few different ways, but all the time thinking with portals. Gelocity 3 has to be my favorite though, its one of (if not THE) best racing activities I've ever played! and I love my racing. ]:)

The coop mode is pretty great as well, it really changes the way you think with p0rtals and offers a new challenge to anyone who has played the game already (there are also coop maps in the workshop).

All in all, you'll probably never get tired of this game and all the options it has to offer.

Do I reccomend this game? No. I say it's a must have for anyone who likes puzzles. Don't know why or how they're called puzzles? Get the game, you'll soon find out. And have fun! :D

If you chose to not play it, then you have made the most foolish choice making you look like a fool when you actually play the game.

In the end of the day, after all of my struggles with life, I take a good look at the moon, and I remember this game.

I remember all of the puzzles, all of the dialogue, all of the sounds, and the characters.

I remember completing this game during a very difficult time of my life, where I didn't understand a disease that was affecting my loved one, and after reading upon some more of the lore, I somehow understood it, and I felt less lost with life.

I thought I lost myself, I thoguht I lost the only person that mattered to me, but after playing this simple game, I felt alive once again, and I knew that I need to fight another day, not just for myself, but for the people that fought for me.

It may sound REALLY cheesy, but this game saved me. It made me laugh, cry, get pissed off on some puzzles that I couldn't solve, and then happy again after I solved it.

Portal 2 is a game that is too special, too rare to miss out. You may not have the same experience that I had while playing this game, but keep in mind it's one of the diamonds in the rough, It's too special to just dismiss it for no reason.

Try it, if money is an issue, get it on sale. Buy the two pack and give this to a friend you know is struggling with life, it will make them happy, just like this game did to me.
A must-play game for everyone, loved it since the first minute.
